msg: - Fixed sorting order issues with reset().

msg: - Fixed an issue in ezcBaseFile::removeRecursive, where the parent directory
could not be written to. We now make sure nothing is deleted until we're sure

msg: - Reset $_SERVER state after running the test to avoid leaking into other tests.
